function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential migration of aerosols from patient rooms into higher traffic corridors, increasing the risk of spreading airborne pathogens.","Impact":"Involuntary exposure of health care workers, patients, and visitors to airborne pathogens.","Mitigation":"Enhanced door mechanisms, ventilation systems, and air filtration to limit aerosol migration.","Technologies":"Advanced air pressure control systems, air purification, and filtration technologies.","People":"Health care workers, patients, visitors.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management."},{"Description":"Involuntary exposure of room occupants to airborne pathogens from occupants of the corridor space due to negative pressure differentials.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for room occupants.","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation and filtration systems, regular air quality monitoring, and PPE requirements for room occupants.","Technologies":"Air pressure control systems, air quality sensors, advanced ventilation systems.","People":"Room occupants, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management."},{"Description":"Drawbacks of anterooms in PE or AII rooms, including increased floor area, travel distance, and visual barrier between patients and care teams.","Impact":"Increased operational costs, potential hindrance to patient care.","Mitigation":"Optimizing anteroom design, considering alternative infection control measures, and cost-benefit analysis.","Technologies":"Efficient space utilization design tools, cost analysis software, infection control technology.","People":"Healthcare facility planners, architects, infection control specialists.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management."}]}
